doc.title: Mabel Mercer: A Singer's Singer
doc.plot: "Mabel Mercer taught me everything I know," said Frank Sinatra. This 17-song set, shot at Cleo's in New York, captures the vocal artistry of Mabel Mercer. Her matchless phrasing gives a new dimension to some of the greatest songs ever written. Maximum music from the "grande dame of popular music."
